examples: our hallmark was openness to all comers
the openness of the Internet makes public debate more possible

noun.description: Lack of secrecy or concealment; frankness.
examples: a democratic society committed to openness and transparency

noun.description: The quality of not being covered with buildings or trees.
examples: the openness of the Western landscape

noun.description: (in sports) a style of play characterized by action which is spread out over the field.
examples: fitness levels have evolved to increase the speed and openness of the game
